statements.commandText: SELECT COLUMN_NAME as `Name`, COLUMN_NAME AS `PropertyName`, CASE IS_NULLABLE WHEN 'YES' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS `IsNullable`, DATA_TYPE AS `DataType`, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH AS `DataLength`, CASE WHEN COLUMN_KEY='PRI' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS `IsPrimaryKey`, CASE WHEN LOCATE('auto_increment',EXTRA)<>0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS `IsIdentity`, COLUMN_COMMENT AS `Description`, ORDINAL_POSITION AS `Sort` FROM information_schema.`COLUMNS` WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA=@database AND TABLE_NAME=@table
